game.name: MultiEnding Heroes
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Embark on a hilarious, choice-driven adventure in MultiEnding Heroes! Guide The Priest and The Hero through multiple universes, making decisions that lead to over 75 unique endings. Every choice matters, will you lead them to glory or disaster?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Embark on a hilarious, choice-driven adventure in MultiEnding Heroes! Guide The Priest and The Hero through multiple universes, making decisions that lead to over 75 unique endings. Every choice matters, will you lead them to glory or disaster?
